content: these crochet fingerless heart gloves are the perfect valentine s day crochet project they are a cute and warm accessory for the chilly month of february and make for a quick project this pattern comes in only one size but you can use a different yarn size to make it bigger or smaller for #3 yarn 7 centimeters wide x 10 centimeters tall 2 95 x 4 13 inches this would fit the average 5-10 year old s hands for #4 yarn 9 centimeters wide x 13 centimeters tall 3 54 x 4 92 inches this would fit the average woman s hands
